channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Hurricane Recovery Efforts Disrupted by Conspiracy Theories and Falsehoods
item.description: Experts warn that weather-related disinformation can rapidly escalate into real-world risks and distract from aid.

item.title: I’ve Covered Politics for 50 Years. Here’s Why So Much Hinges on Electing Kamala Harris.
item.description: The Democratic candidate would bring three things the country desperately needs: stability, unity and optimism.

item.title: Jamie Dimon says global politics are ‘treacherous and getting worse’—so he’s preparing for anything
item.description: In JPMorgan Chase's third quarter earnings release Jamie Dimon also mentioned inflation, national debt and trade restructuring.

item.title: Trump Aides Sought Enhanced Security for Closing Stages of Campaign

item.title: Social media loving FTX exec Ryan Salame heads to prison—and his GOP wife may soon follow
item.description: Unlike Sam Bankman-Fried's other deputies, Salame did not cooperate with prosecutors.

item.title: Forget acid washed! Wrangler partners with Coors Banquet for beer wash jeans
item.description: Win a pair between now and Oct. 21.

item.title: The best time to brush your teeth, according to a dentist. (Hint: It’s not right after breakfast)
item.description: When you brush your teeth can make a big difference in your oral health.

item.title: The Market Has Been Fabulous, Maybe Excessively So
item.description: You may not realize how great the stock market has been. But, our columnist says, it can’t keep rising at this pace for long.
